name: gb_patrolship
description: Destroy 2 enemy flagships with the ability of Greater Britain's patrol ship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER:  The Britanium Spikes have a 20% chance of staying activated after the first collision.

name: gb_torpedoship
description: Destroy 10 ships with Greater Britain's torpedo ship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The cooldown for the torpedo ship's stealth ability is reduced by 25%.

name: gb_henship
description: Steal 15 metamatter with the ability of Greater Britain's henship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The Cleptodrone has a 10% chance of stealing 4 units of metamatter instead of just 3.

name: gb_destroyer
description: Destroy 15 enemy ships with Greater Britain's destroyer (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The Repulsion Torpedo's range is increased by 10%.

name: ce_patrolship
description: Destroy 3 enemy ships with the ability of the Celestial Empire's patrol ship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: Essence of Destruction does 25% more damage.

name: ce_destroyer
description: Destroy 15 enemy ships with the ability of the Celestial Empire's destroyer (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: Chain Lightning will rebound a 3rd time to now cause damage to 4 different ships.

name: ce_battleship
description: Destroy 25 enemy ships with any ally vessel that is in a supercharged state (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: Supercharge state lasts an additional 10 seconds.

name: gb_corvette
description: Destroy 10 ships with Greater Britain's corvette (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: Lasers that are deflected by the shield have a 5% chance to travel twice as far and do damage to enemy vessels.

name: gb_battleship
description: Destroy 25 enemy ships with Greater Britain's battleship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The battleship's armor will absorb 90% of all damage (instead of 75%) while the Magnet is active.

name: ce_corvette
description: Convert 5 enemy ships with the Celestial Empire's Corvette (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: Your control over an enemy ship will last an additional 5 seconds.

name: gb_flagship1
description: Win 1 match with Greater Britain without taking any damage on your flagship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The Homing Rocket's range is increased by 100%

name: gb_flagship2
description: Finish Wilbur Pittbottom's campaign.  NEW POWER: The Homing Rocket's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

name: gb_flagship3
description: Finish 1st in 5 competitive multiplayer matches while using Greater Britain. NEW POWER: The Greater Britain's flagship will now launch 20 homing rockets instead of 15.

name: ce_henship
description: Collect 10 points of metamatter in a single harvest with the Celestial Empire's henship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The Havest's range is increased by 15%.

name: ce_torpedoship
description: Cover 3 or more enemies under a single electromagnetic storm with the Celestial Empire's torpedo ship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The electromagnetic storm lasts 3 seconds longer and has 10% longer range.

name: ce_flagship1
description: Win 1 match with the Celestial Empire without taking any damage on your flagship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The Thunderbolt's active range is 20% larger.

name: ce_flagship2
description: Finish Leonne d'Artagnan's campaign. NEW POWER: The Thunderbolt's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

name: ce_flagship3
description: Finish 1st in 5 competitive multiplayer matches while using the Celestial Empire. NEW POWER: The Thunderbolt will now cause 5% more damage.

name: gb_frigate
description: Destroy 5 ships, by bumping them into an asteroid or planet, with Greater Britain's frigate (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: Nav Assist's cooldown is reduced by 25%.

name: ce_frigate
description: Destroy 5 ships, by bumping them into an asteroid or planet, with the ability of the Celestial Empire's frigate (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The wind no longer affects your own ships.

name: ce_flagship4
description: Complete 10 matchs in competitive multiplayer while using the Celestial Empire. NEW POWER: The Thunderbolt lasts 5 more seconds.

name: gb_flagship4
description: Complete 10 matchs in competitive multiplayer while using Greater Britain. NEW POWER: Each homing rocket does 5% more damage.

name: sa_patrolship
description: Destroy 5 enemy ships with Sacred Alliance's patrolship (in competitive multiplayer). NEW POWER: The Patrol Ship can teleport 10% further.

name: sa_torpedoship
description: Destroy 5 enemy ships with the Sacred Alliance's Torpedo Ship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Redemption cooldown is reduced by 25%

name: sa_henship
description: Harvest 200 points of metamatter with the Sacred Alliance's Henship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Divine Blessing action lasts an additional 10 seconds.

name: sa_corvette
description: Teleport 5 ships with the Sacred Alliance's Corvette (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: Banishment of the Miscreant's cooldown is reduced by 10%.

name: sa_frigate
displayName: Improved Return Of The Lost Sheep
description: Teleport 5 ships from max range with the Return of the Lost Sheep action (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: Return of the Lost Sheep costs 1 less point of metamatter to use.

name: sa_destroyer
description: Destroy 15 enemy ships with the Sacred Alliance Destroyer's Divine Ray action (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Divine Ray action lasts an additional 5 seconds.

name: sa_battleship
description: Destroy 25 enemy ships with the Sacred Alliance Battleships' Hell Shaft action (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Hell Shaft does an additional 5% damage.

name: sa_flagship1
description: Finish 1st in 5 competitive mode matches with the Sacred Alliance. NEW POWER: The Chronosanctification action will last 10% long.

name: sa_flagship2
description: Finish 1st in a competitive match without taking any damage on your flagship with the Sacred Alliance. NEW POWER: Enemy ships are slowed down twice as much.

name: sa_flagship3
description: Finish the Campaign mode with Octavio. NEW POWER: The cooldown time of the Chronosanctification action is reduced by 30 seconds.

name: sa_flagship4
description: Finish 10 competitive mode matches with the Sacred Alliance. NEW POWER: The cost of the Chronosanctification action is reduced by 1 point of metamatter.

name: sg_patrolship
description: Destroy 5 enemy ships with the Sublime Gate's Patrol Ship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: Polymorphism lasts an additional 5 seconds.

name: sg_torpedoship
description: Destroy 15 enemy ships with the Sublime Gate's Torpedo Ship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: Each clone created with a Tumoral Explosion receives less of an armour penalty.

name: sg_henship
description: Harvest 200 points of metamatter with the Sublime Gate's Henship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Death Ray action cost is reduced by 2 points of metamatter.

name: sg_corvette
description: Destroy 10 enemy ships with the Sublime Gate's Fire Ship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The cooldown time of the Fire Ship action is reduced by 20%.

name: sg_frigate
description: Destroy 5 enemy ships with the Sublime Gate's Frigate (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Oasis action lasts an additional 5 seconds.

name: sg_destroyer
description: Destroy 15 enemy ships with the Sublime Gate Destroyer's Astrocannon (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Astrocannon's range is increased by 10%.

name: sg_battleship
description: Destroy 25 enemy ships with the Sublime Gate's Battleship (in competitive multiplayer mode). NEW POWER: The Battleship created by Mytosis receives less of an armour penalty.

name: sg_flagship1
description: Finish 1st in 5 competitive mode matches with the Sublime Gate. NEW POWER: The Sultan's Pride's range in increased by 10%.

name: sg_flagship2
description: Finish 1st in a competitive match without taking any damage on your flagship with the Sublime Gate. NEW POWER: The Sultan's Pride will last an additional 5 seconds.

name: sg_flagship3
description: Finish the campaign mode with Ka√Øn and Kaan. NEW POWER: The Sultan's Pride's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

name: sg_flagship4
description: Finish 10 competitive mode matches with the Sublime Gate. NEW POWER: Each bullet fired by The Sultan's Pride does an additional 5% damage.
